original_title: Bleeding Black & Yellow: The UltraViolent Dream
overview: "The Bulldozer" Matt Tremont. Violent. Dangerous. Raw. Real. "Bleeding Black and Yellow" will feature a day in the life as seen through Matt Tremont's eyes. Follow Matt Tremont's UltraViolent Dream from 2007 to the sadistic "Tangled Web".
title: Bleeding Black & Yellow: The UltraViolent Dream
